descriptionHtml:
A Retexture of the Kaer Morhen armor here on the nexus. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/39363975/?]Pierre A/K/A Hovihar[/url] extracted these textures from The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt and redid them. Just install with your favorite mod manager or dump the files into the Data folder.

You need this mod for these textures to work: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71762/?

Credits
[color=#ff0000]CD Projekt RED[/color] for allowing me to use their assets for skyrim mods. I am in no way affiliated with CDPR or their partner
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/39363975/?]Pierre A/K/A Hovihar[/url] for redoing these textures and teaching me how to mod.

[color=#00ff00]Permission[/color]
These files can't be redistributed or uploaded to any external site without the consent of Me or Pierre.
author: Hovihar and JRobinson88
